sections.heading: Director
sections.text:
of State Department of Agriculture ex officio State Sealer of Measurement

Standards; enforcement of chapter.

sections.heading: Enforcement
sections.text:
of chapter: Entry into commercial premises or cannabis establishment; stop-use,

hold and removal orders; seizure of property; inspection of vehicles.

sections.heading: Enforcement
sections.text:
of chapter: Authority to obtain restraining order or temporary or permanent

injunction.

sections.heading: Duties:
sections.text:
Proper use of weights and measures used in commercial services and cannabis

establishments; prevention of unfair and deceptive dealing; availability of

facilities of Division; promotion of uniformity with laws of other states and

federal agencies; ensurance of equity between buyers and sellers.

sections.heading: Duties:
sections.text:
Standards; enforcement; exemptions; investigations; civil penalties; inspections,

tests and approval of commercial weights and measures and cannabis weighing and

measuring equipment; verification of packaged commodities; prescription of

appropriate terms and units; provision of training for governmental employees;

determination of accuracy of prices.

sections.text:
